courses.name: Doctoral Seminar V
courses.description: This course is for students at the Ph.D.'s program in Engineering. Students engage in methodological frameworks to write a research proposal and find suitable grants for its support.

courses.name: Doctoral Seminar IV
courses.description: This course is for students at the Ph.D.'s program in Engineering. Students engage in methodological frameworks to write a journal article and find suitable venue for its submission.
